mapper.select: SELECT u_auth FROM sb_auth WHERE 1=1 AND u_email = #{email}

SELECT u_email as username, u_password as password, u_email as email, u_isAccountNonExpired as isAccountNonExpired, u_isAccountNonLocked as isAccountNonLocked, u_isCredentialNonExpired as isCredentialsNonExpired, u_isEnabled as isEnabled FROM sb_user WHERE 1=1 AND u_email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sb_user ( u_name, u_password, u_email, u_isAccountNonExpired, u_isAccountNonLocked, u_isCredentialNonExpired, u_isEnabled ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{isAccountNonExpired}, #{isAccountNonLocked}, #{isCredentialsNonExpired}, #{isEnabled} )
